org.missile.view
Interface Drawable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Base, City, Explosion, GameElement, Missile
public interface Drawable

Interface provided by the view layer to be implemented in all the elements which need to be drawn.

The purpose of this interface is both to decouple the communication between model and view and semantic. We can mark a class as "Drawable" by forcing it to implement this interface.

Author:
Luis Carlos Mateos
